{"id":1277016190,"question_id":3430,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 month, 2 weeks","timestamp":1717474186,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1406 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1277016190/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Days Without Meetings","memory":"65.9 MB","code":"class Solution:\n    def countDays(self, days: int, s: List[List[int]]) -> int:\n        s.sort()\n\n        def merge():\n            stack = []\n            stack.append(s[0])\n\n            for i in s[1:]:\n                if stack[-1][0] <= i[0] <= stack[-1][-1]:\n                    stack[-1][-1] = max(stack[-1][-1], i[-1])\n                else:\n                    stack.append(i)\n            return stack\n        \n        s = merge()\n        \n        total = 0\n        total += abs(s[0][0] - 1)\n        total += abs(s[-1][1] - days)\n\n        for i in range(len(s)-1):\n            end = s[i][1]\n            nxt = s[i+1][0]\n\n            if end > nxt or end == nxt or end+1 == nxt:\n                continue\n            elif end < nxt:\n                total += (abs(nxt - end) - 1)\n        \n        return total\n        \n        ","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-days-without-meetings","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
